message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.NI. 

The paper deals with a consensus scheme for blockchain, which is a topic related to cryptography and security (cs.CR). It also involves distributed systems and networking (cs.DC), as well as algorithms and data structures (cs.DS). The use of deterministic selection and lightweight endorsement mechanisms suggests a focus on system design and control (cs.SY), while the need for reliable long-term identities and fair block creation points towards network infrastructure (cs.NI).
